pullRequest.body: And bunch up the non-deprecated declarations.

---

#### Declarations diff

`+ instance [DecidableEq α] : DecidableRel (@Equiv α) := fun x y =>`
`- instance [DecidableEq α] : DecidableRel (@Equiv α) := fun _ _ => And.decidable`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10797694295/job/29949502319)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10797694295/job/29949504053)

Thanks! I think the result is a lot more robust now.

bors r+

Thanks! I think the result is a lot more robust now.

bors r+

I personally would prefer if we refer to instance names as little as possible.
Can you use `inferInstance` or `inferInstanceAs (some term)` here and elsewhere?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: deprecate most of `Init.Logic`
